long_description: A reinvention of the classic OtterBox dry box, the 100% waterproof Pursuit 20 dry case helps protect your phone and small essentials from water and dust-and from drop and crush damage too! 4.25 x 2.5 x 0.875 in. internal dimensions let you store an iPhone or similar-size device, keys, passport and wallet. Internal webbing hammock and rubber cushioning help keep your gear securely in place. External rubber bumpers provide shock resistance and grip. Secure latch is super strong, yet easy to open. The OtterBox Pursuit 20 dry case features a lockable carabiner loop and attachment loops for a tether or belt.
short_description: A reinvention of the classic OtterBox dry box, the 100% waterproof Pursuit 20 dry case helps protect your phone and small essentials from water and dust-and from drop and crush damage too!
